record.id: field.name="calc.interval" and file.name="AlertDef" and term="Time added when calculating alert time" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: calc.interval - AlertDef - Time added when calculating alert time - - en
record.field.name: calc.interval
record.file.name: AlertDef
record.term: Time added when calculating alert time

brief.brief: The length of time to add to the value specified in the "Name Of The Field To Be Used In Calculating Alert Time" (calc.time.field) to determine the alert time.
The time interval can be positive or negative.

detail.detail: The value stored in this field is a time interval that Service Manager adds to the value specified in the "Name Of The Field To Be Used In Calculating Alert Time" (calc.time.field) field, to determine the alert time.
